terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.section_a:
### A. Purpose & Acceptance

StoryX is an AI-powered platform that generates personalized children's stories with illustrations and audio narration. By creating an account and using the service, you accept these Terms & Conditions in full.

All content generated on StoryX is produced by artificial intelligence models. The platform is provided "as is" and is intended for entertainment and educational purposes.
terms.section_b:
### B. Intellectual Property

All stories, illustrations, and audio content generated through StoryX belong to the user who created them. You are free to use, share, and distribute your generated stories for personal, non-commercial purposes.

By using the platform, you grant StoryX a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to store and display your generated content within the platform for the purpose of providing the service.

The StoryX brand, source code, AI models, and underlying technology remain the exclusive property of their respective owners. No rights to these elements are transferred to users.
terms.section_c:
### C. Liability & AI Limitations

StoryX uses artificial intelligence to generate content. As such:

- **No guarantee of accuracy:** AI-generated content may contain errors, inconsistencies, or unexpected elements (commonly known as "hallucinations").
- **Parental supervision required:** Stories are designed for children, but parental review of generated content is recommended before sharing with minors.
- **No liability for AI output:** StoryX and its operators cannot be held liable for the content generated by AI models, including any inaccuracies or inappropriate content that may occasionally be produced.
- **Service availability:** We strive to maintain continuous service but cannot guarantee uninterrupted availability.
terms.section_d:
### D. Protection of Minors

In accordance with Belgian law and European regulations:

- Users must be at least **13 years old** to create an account on StoryX.
- Children under 13 may only use the platform through an account created and supervised by a parent or legal guardian.
- Parents and guardians are responsible for supervising their children's use of the platform and reviewing generated content.
- StoryX does not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13 without parental consent.
terms.section_e:
### E. User Audio & AI Hybrid Narration

1. **Audio Integration:** Our service allows you to record or upload audio clips ("User Audio") to be integrated into a digital story alongside AI-generated narration.
2. **No Voice Cloning:** In this stage of the service, we do not create a synthetic clone or "voiceprint" of your voice. We simply "cut and paste" your recorded audio into the story file.
3. **Ownership & License:** You retain ownership of your User Audio. You grant us a limited, temporary license to store and process this audio solely to generate your requested story.
4. **AI Labeling:** In compliance with the EU AI Act, all stories generated will contain a metadata tag or audible disclosure stating: "This story contains AI-generated content mixed with user-provided audio."
5. **Retention:** User Audio is stored on secure EU-based servers (Google Cloud) and is deleted [X] days after the final story is generated, unless you choose to save it to your personal Library.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section_a:
### A. Data Controller

[Your Company] SRL, with registered office at [Address], Belgium (VAT: BE 0123.456.789), is the data controller for all personal data processed through StoryX, in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

For any privacy-related enquiries, contact us at: **[email]**
privacy.section_b:
### B. Data We Collect

We collect and process the following categories of personal data:

- **Account data:** email address, username, and hashed password (or Google account identifier for OAuth users).
- **Usage data:** stories created, credit transactions, and timestamps.
- **Audio data:** voice recordings you voluntarily provide for story narration.
- **Technical data:** IP address, browser type, and session identifiers necessary for the service to function.

We do **not** collect data from third-party trackers, advertising networks, or social media plugins.
privacy.section_c:
### C. How We Use Your Data

Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

- **Service delivery:** generating stories, cover images, and audio narration.
- **Account management:** authentication, credit balance, and transaction history.
- **Legal compliance:** fulfilling obligations under Belgian and EU law.
- **Service improvement:** aggregated, anonymised usage statistics (no individual profiling).

Legal bases: performance of a contract (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR), legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR), and legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR).
privacy.section_d:
### D. Data Storage & Security

- All data is stored on **EU-based servers** (Google Cloud, Belgium/Netherlands region).
- Passwords are hashed with **bcrypt** and are never stored in plain text.
- All connections are encrypted via **TLS/HTTPS**.
- User audio recordings are deleted **[X] days** after story generation, unless saved to your Library.
- We implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to protect your data against unauthorised access, loss, or alteration.
privacy.section_e:
### E. Your Rights (GDPR)

As an EU resident, you have the following rights:

- **Access:** request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.
- **Rectification:** correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
- **Erasure:** request deletion of your account and all associated data ("right to be forgotten").
- **Portability:** receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
- **Restriction:** request that we limit the processing of your data.
- **Objection:** object to data processing based on legitimate interest.
- **Withdraw consent:** where processing is based on consent, withdraw it at any time.

To exercise any of these rights, contact **[email]**. We will respond within 30 days. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Belgian Data Protection Authority (APD/GBA).
privacy.section_f:
### F. Cookies & Local Storage

StoryX uses only **essential session cookies** required for the application to function (authentication, language preference). We do **not** use analytics cookies, advertising cookies, or any third-party tracking cookies.

No cookie consent banner is required as we only use strictly necessary cookies (Art. 5(3) ePrivacy Directive).
privacy.section_g:
### G. Children's Privacy

StoryX is designed for use by families. In accordance with Article 8 of the GDPR and Belgian law:

- Users under **13** may only use the platform through a parent or guardian's account.
- We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13 without verified parental consent.
- Parents may request access to, correction of, or deletion of their child's data at any time.

If you believe a child under 13 has provided personal data without parental consent, contact us immediately at **[email]**.
